title: Chicken Valdostana
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons plain flour', '6 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets - pounded thin', '55g unsalted butter', '10 fresh mushrooms, sliced', '180ml dry white wine', '180ml chicken stock', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon freshly ground white pepper', '6 slices thinly sliced prosciutto', '6 slices fontina cheese']
